original_text: But Pilate still wanted to let Jesus go. So he spoke to the crowd again.
korean_text: 빌라도는 예수를 놓고자 하여 다시 그들에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: But Pilate still wanted to let Jesus go
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 빌라도는 여전히 예수를 놓아주고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: So he spoke to the crowd again
